ad_text: Casella Waste Systems Sponsored Interested in a career as a truck driver but don't know where to start? Casella is looking for you! Sign up today for a CDL Permit Training Workshop hosted by Casella at our Burlington Hauling location. What to Expect: - Three-day permit training to prepare for CLP test at DMV - Within two weeks of getting a permit, and upon your hiring at Casella, you will be eligible to go through the CDL Driver Training School What to Know: - Must be at least 18 years of age with a valid driver's license - Available to the first 35. people who sign up - Held 5-8 pm each day - Completely free of charge Sign up today: https://careers-casella.icims.com/connect?eventId=3344&shareLink=1&mobile=false&width=1637&height=500&bga=true&needsRedirect=false&jan1offset=-300&jun1offset=-240location Mon, Feb 20, 2023 CDL-B Permit Training Workshop 220 Avenue B, Williston, VT 05495-7148, United States careers-casella.icims.com Buy tickets
